Texts.Chs: <极大的快乐正被这个生物感受到。感谢将以免费货币支付的形式表现。血肉的存在感激这些手势。以它你可支付商品和服务。>
Texts.Eng: <Great joy is felt by this being. Appreciation will be shown with gratuitous monetary payment. Fleshlings appreciate such gestures. With it you could purchase goods and services.>

Texts.Chs: <^red;一个声音在你的脑海中说话：^reset;心情非常烦乱。远征已成失败。无法定位^orange;古代远程设备^reset;，无法再以高价出售。如若两足之辈找到一个，吾辈将感激不尽，吾辈会购买它。>
Texts.Eng: <^red;A voice speaks in your head:^reset; Most upsetting. Expedition was a failure. Could not locate ^orange;Ancient Remote^reset; to sell at exorbitant price. If mortal biped locates one, I would be most grateful to purchase it.>

Texts.Chs: 把一个^orange;古代远程设备^reset;带给^green;影裔商店^reset;(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring an ^orange;Ancient Remote^reset; to the ^green;Shadow Shop^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
